column3: Latest;The Ministry of Health has announced that 2 cases of COVID-19 have been found in Kampot province and another 2 (a 71-year-old man and a 52-year-old man in Tboung Khmum. in Tbong Khmom).------EDIT: The Kampot cases were already previously reported today
